snippet.title: Infinity Project: PATTERNS - Official HD Gameplay Trailer (NEW INDIE RPG 08/03/2022)
snippet.description:
Behold! The very first solo Indie RPG made by the artist NEnd (NEndTV on twitch!) for Windows PC!

"Infinity Project: PATTERNS" is an urban-fantasy, horror RPG created and developed by the artist known as NEnd (NEndTV) published under the Bad Grin Company name.

A story over a decade in the making, "-Infinity Project-" is a multigenre series which tracks the lives of a wide cast of characters in their journey to find a place to exist.

In "PATTERNS", strange powers and void-like beings threaten the struggling normalcy of the Nameless City, a hopeful region at the end of the world that clings to a past life.

Between the independent citizens of this city, its military government, and the dark forces that lurk below, who can say they really know the right way to live?

Spend time with your friends to grow a bond strong enough to make it through anything.

Now available to WISHLIST on STEAM!
( https://store.steampowered.com/app/2061000/Infinity_Project_PATTERNS/ )
For more info, check out our website!
( https://www.badgrinco.com/projects/patterns )
And our Twitter!
( https://twitter.com/BadGrinCo )

Let us know what you think! Please Like + Share + Comment + Subscribe!
